name: Jahwaiian
description: Jahwaiian by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank is a tropical mashup of two legendary strains. By combining Lamb’s Bread genetics sourced directly from Nine Mile, St. Anne’s, Jamaica, and the “Sweet Lady of Waiāhole” (AKA Hawai’i ‘78), Pua Mana crafted an uplifting strain that harnesses the tropical vibes and aromas distinct to the Hawaiian and Caribbean coastlines. Jahwaiian’s effects are stimulating, delivering plenty of energy to the body. Also anticipate a manageable headiness that encourages self-reflection. This strain may help curb depression and fatigue while encouraging physical activity.
descriptionPlain: Jahwaiian by Pua Mana 1st Hawaiian Pakalōlō Seed Bank is a tropical mashup of two legendary strains. By combining Lamb’s Bread genetics sourced directly from Nine Mile, St. Anne’s, Jamaica, and the “Sweet Lady of Waiāhole” (AKA Hawai’i ‘78), Pua Mana crafted an uplifting strain that harnesses the tropical vibes and aromas distinct to the Hawaiian and Caribbean coastlines. Jahwaiian’s effects are stimulating, delivering plenty of energy to the body. Also anticipate a manageable headiness that encourages self-reflection. This strain may help curb depression and fatigue while encouraging physical activity.

highlightedReviews.text:
Jahwaiian is a perfect blend of two of the most legendary island sativa strains of all time!

We sourced our Lambsbread directly from the source: Nine Mile, St. Anne's, Jamaica.

Pua Mana 'Ohana connected with Bob Marley's cousin Hugh Creek Peart A.K.A. Sledger (author of the song Rebel Music/3 O'clock roadblock) while filming the documentary "Sledger" that is now available on Youtube.

Lambsbread can be seen in the documentary and was a favorite strain of Bob Marley's still cultivated to this day by his family in Jamaica.

Hawai'i '78 also known as: "Sweet lady of Waiahole" and "Jurassic Bud" (a local strain cultivated near where they filmed Jurassic Park),a Hawaiian landrace from Waiahole, O'ahu.

We pollinated our sweetest Wahine (female) Lambsbread crossing her with a strong and powerful Kane (male) Hawai'i '78 and the results have been nothing short of spectacular!!

Retaining what makes each individual strain special all the while complimenting the other combining unique island flavors and going absolutely crazy with hybrid vigor.

All profits from Jahwaiian and Lambsbread brought in by Pua Mana 'Ohana will be returned to Bradda Sledger for the benefit the community of Nine Mile Jamaica.

As Bob would want it to be, so mote it be.

Mahalo (thanks) to Bradda Sledger and Pua Mana 'Ohana; it is so.

Aloha a hui hou
Pua Mana 'Ohana

To see where the genetics for this strain were sourced watch the documentary "SLEDGER" on Youtube - Sledger is Bob Marley's 1st cousin born in the same house and raised together Sledger is Bob's ganja farmer cousin and has been cultivating Jamaican cannabis since the old days - Mahalo Pua Mana 'Ohana for this wonderful sativa hybrid strain!
